message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
You took 90% last round, I'll offer you 40% this time. It's a good deal for you!
I'm willing to compromise, but 40% was too low. Let's split it 55/45.  This way we both get a decent share, and we can finally end this!
I'll meet you in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more for my patience. This is my final offer!
